summary: "Never Let Me Go" is a 2005 science fiction book by British author Kazuo Ishiguro. It was nominated for several big awards and won many, including the Nobel Prize in Literature in 2017. The story is about a group of friends who discover a dark secret about their past. A movie based on the book came out in 2010, and a Japanese TV drama in 2016. Time magazine picked it as the best novel of 2005.
title: Never Let Me Go (novel)
